```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
url <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Opinion_polling_for_the_United_Kingdom_European_Union_membership_referendum&oldid=896735054"

```

```{r}
tab <- read_html(url) %>% html_nodes("table")
polls <- tab[[7]] %>% html_table(fill = TRUE)
#polls
polls <- polls %>% setNames(c("dates", "remain", "leave", "undecided", "lead", "samplesize", "pollster", "poll_type", "notes")) 
```

```{r}
index <- str_detect(polls$remain,"%")
#polls$remain[index]
polls$undecided
tes <- as.numeric(str_replace(polls$remain, "%", ""))/100 
str_replace(polls$undecided,"N/A","0")

```

```{r}
#polls$dates
temp <- str_extract_all(polls$dates,"\\d+\\s[a-zA-Z]{3,5}")
temp
```
